text: David P.I. James is an American visual effects artist and supervisor. He has worked with Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures on a number of movies, including The Rocketeer, Mighty Joe Young, Inspector Gadget, Mission to Mars, 102 Dalmatians, The Princess Diaries, The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, Doctor Strange, and Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2. == Filmography == * Look Who's Talking (1989) visual effects coordinator * The Rocketeer (1991) visual effects production assistant * Hook (1991) visual effects production manager * Mighty Joe Young (1998) visual effects production manager * Inspector Gadget (1999) visual effects plate manager * Mission to Mars (2000) visual effects plate manager: Dream Quest Images * 102 Dalmatians (2000) visual effects plate producer * The Princess Diaries (2001) plate supervisor * Kangaroo Jack (2003) visual effects producer * 50 First Dates (2004) visual effects plate producer * The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005) motion capture producer * Zoom (2006) visual effects producer: Digital Domain * The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning (2006) visual effects producer: Digital Domain * The Hitcher (2007) visual effects producer * Transformers (2007) visual effects producer: Digital Domain * The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising (2007) visual effects producer: Digital Domain * G-Force (2009) story, executive producer * G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009) visual effects producer: Digital Domain * Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel (2009) visual effects plate producer * I'm Here (Short 2010) visual effect producer: Digital Domain * Hop (2011) visual effects plate producer * Big Miracle (2012) visual effects producer * Silver Linings Playbook (2012) visual effects producer * After Earth (2013) visual effects producer * Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016) visual effects producer: MPC * Doctor Strange (2016) vfx producer: Method Studios * Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017) visual effects producer: method studios == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:American artists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David P.I. James
